title: Bug 124066 - Insert chart in context menu is not translated into Chinese
description: When using the context menu in the layout, the 'Insert Chart' option is not being translated into Chinese.
OB: When using the context menu in the layout, the 'Insert Chart' option should be translated into Chinese.
EB: When using the context menu in the layout and right clicking, the 'Insert Chart' option should be translated into Chinese. However, it is currently not translated into Chinese.
SR:
To reproduce this issue: 
1. Create a report in a Chinese environment.
